name: Cinnamon Rolls
author: In Memory of Celena Blattel
instructions: Combine, yeast, water and 2 teaspoon sugar. Stir and let stand for 10 minutes. Then add milk, shortening, 1/2 cup sugar and salt. Let mixture cool until lukewarm. Then, add eggs and 2 cups flour. Beat with spoon to make batter. Add remaining flour a little at a time. Knead it like bread. Put in bowl. Let rise to more than double. Roll dough out to 1/2 inch thick. Spread melted butter over dough. Sprinkle with sugar, cinnamon and nut mixture. Roll like a jelly roll and cut in 1 inch thick slices. Put in greased pan and let rise until doubled. Bake at 375Â° until done.
